metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3580 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in the way nettle's RSA decryption functions handled specially crafted ciphertext. An attacker could use this flaw to provide a manipulated ciphertext leading to application crash and denial of service.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> this fix relies on the RSA refactoring that is required to fix CVE-2018-16869, which is too intrusive to backport to older releases

criterions.comment: nettle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
